name: Hadron Engine
desc: On switch-in, summons Electric Terrain. During Electric Terrain, Sp. Atk is 1.3333x.
shortDesc: On switch-in, summons Electric Terrain. During Electric Terrain, Sp. Atk is 1.3333x.

flavorText.sv: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
